Test Name: Respiratory Syncytial Virus (RSV) In Situ Hybridization
Specimen Type: Formalin-fixed, paraffin-embedded (FFPE) tissue or ethanol-fixed cytological specimens
Purpose: To detect Respiratory Syncytial Virus RNA in clinical specimens using in situ hybridization.
Container: Formalin-fixed, paraffin-embedded tissue block or ethanol-fixed slide
Equipment: Hybridization oven, humidity chamber, water bath, microscope
